Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, just west of the Necropolis.
Room.LongDescription: The large Oceancrest Necropolis lies on the east side of Lankshire Parkway, surrounded by tall, metal bars preventing looters, grave robbers and other lunatics from entering the facility. The Main Entrance to the Necropolis is located off of Netherworld Lane to the north. On the west, you can see the Khelleva Mansion, a powerful monument to the most powerful family in Oceancrest.
